description: This file defines a React functional component named Header that renders a header section for a food ordering application. It includes branding, avatar, search input, filter button, and a list of category chips. The component exposes props for categories, active category, and callback functions for changing categories and opening filters.

methods.name: Header({ categories = [], activeCategory = '', onCategoryChange, onFilter })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the application header with branding, profile avatar, search bar, filter button, and category chips. Accepts props for categories, active category, and callback functions for interaction.

ctags.name: Header
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Header({ categories = [], activeCategory = '', onCategoryChange, onFilte/
